title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sen. Mike Lee & Robert Epstein | 10/14/20
description:
Sen. Mike Lee talks Amy Coney Barrett’s hearing and gives quite the endorsement of her and President Trump. New files claim Hunter Biden introduced Joe Biden to a top Burisma official, but there’s something off about where they allegedly came from. Dr. Robert Epstein gives an update on his election monitoring system and the interference of big tech in our elections.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
